author: A message inside your mind.
desc_1:
Is this thing working?
Can you hear me?
badend: Uh.. forget it then. I'll look for someone else.
lore_1:
Hey, No time for questions ok?

We need you to resolve this situation.

I unfortunately had to *forcibly* remove you from your current universe, and I don't have enough power to bring you back so soon.

When you reincarnate into this world, you will end up remembering it with a dream...

So I'll be as precise as possible...
